aboutMePage.title: About me
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I'm a highly motivated front-end developer and always looking to learn new technologies. I have solid experience in React and Next.js, and I'm always available to face new challenges and improve my skills. I have a passion for creating amazing, responsive user interfaces, and I enjoy working on challenging problems. Furthermore, I am able to work effectively in a team and communicate clearly with other team members. I am always willing to learn and adapt to new situations, making me a flexible and reliable developer for any project.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: I have greater aptitude for the Front-end area, with solid knowledge in the stack: React.Js, Next.Js, HTML, Css and Styled components.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: Bachelor in Computer Science And Engineering from Poornima College Of Engineering Jaipur, Rajasthan, with graduation completed in the first half of 2025

github_card.bio: Fullstack developer with more experience in the Javascript stack, Node.js, React and Next.js.

portifolioPage.title: Portfolio
portifolioPage.subtitle: Browse and learn more about my study projects and work carried out

id_1.title: Game Listing Website
id_1.description: The platform showcases games in an appealing layout, providing users with an immersive browsing experience. Upon clicking a game, users are redirected to a dedicated game details page featuring a download button, rating card, and user reviews.

id_2.title: Xplainerr
id_2.description: Implemented Xplainerr using Next.js, React.js, and Tailwind CSS, optimizing performance, SEO, and user experience with a seamless and responsive design.

id_3.title: Netflix GPT
id_3.description: Developed Netflix GPT using React, Tailwind CSS, Firebase, and TogetherAI, enabling AI-powered movie recommendations with a seamless user experience.

id_4.title: Travel and Tour
id_4.description: Developed a Travel and Tour Website using React, Tailwind CSS, and JavaScript, providing seamless trip bookings, destination details, and an interactive user experience.

id_5.title: Portfolio Website
id_5.description: Built a modern portfolio website using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, featuring a responsive design, dynamic project showcase, and optimized performance for fast loading.

id_6.title: Music Player
id_6.description: Developed a Spotify-like Music Player using React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, enabling seamless music streaming, playlist management, and user authentication.

id_7.title: Blogging Website
id_7.description: Developed a blogging website using React and Appwrite, enabling seamless content creation, user authentication, and real-time database management with a clean and responsive UI.

id_8.title: To Do List
id_8.description: Developed a To-Do List website using React and RTK, enabling efficient state management, task creation, and real-time updates with a user-friendly interface.

id_9.title: Currency Converter
id_9.description: Developed a Currency Converter using React and an external API, enabling real-time exchange rate conversions with a simple and responsive user interface.

id_10.title: GYM Website
id_10.description: Developed a Gym Website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring a modern design, interactive elements, and a responsive layout for an engaging user experience.

id_11.title: Game Displaying Platform
id_11.description: A dynamic game-listing platform built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Axios, fetching and displaying games seamlessly using an API.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about my software development services

questions.question: How long does it take to develop custom software?
questions.answer: The development time varies depending on the complexity and scope of the project. Simple projects may take 4 to 6 weeks, while more complex solutions can take several months. During our initial consultation, I can provide a more accurate estimate based on your needs.

questions.question: What is the process for developing custom software?
questions.answer: The process generally follows these steps: initial consultation, requirement definition, interface design, development, testing, and launch. After the launch, I provide support and maintenance to ensure everything runs smoothly.

questions.question: Do you provide maintenance and support after the project delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer support and maintenance to ensure the software continues to function correctly. We can discuss ongoing maintenance packages or on-demand support.

questions.question: Can I track the progress of my project?
questions.answer: Yes, I maintain regular communication with clients throughout the project. I use project management tools for frequent updates and hold meetings to discuss progress and any necessary adjustments.

questions.question: What are the costs involved in developing custom software?
questions.answer: The cost depends on the complexity of the project, the desired features, and the time needed for development. After discussing your requirements, I will provide a detailed cost estimate.

questions.question: Do you work with user interface (UI) design and user experience (UX)?
questions.answer: Yes, I believe a good interface and an intuitive user experience are crucial for software success. I focus on UI/UX design with an emphasis on usability and user satisfaction.

questions.question: Do you offer consulting services before starting development?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer consulting to better understand your needs and help define the project requirements. This phase is essential to ensure all important details are covered.

questions.question: Can you integrate the software with other platforms or systems?
questions.answer: Yes, I develop solutions that can integrate with other platforms or systems, such as databases, third-party services, APIs, and more. Integrations are planned according to the specific needs of the project.

questions.question: Will the software be responsive and optimized for mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes, all the software I develop is optimized to work well on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones, ensuring a consistent experience for all users.

questions.question: What types of projects have you developed?
questions.answer: I have experience with a wide range of projects, such as e-commerce applications, content management systems, service booking platforms, data analysis dashboards, among others. You can check out examples of previous work in my portfolio.

questions.question: Can I request changes to the project during development?
questions.answer: Yes, but depending on the project's phase, changes may affect the timeline and budget. However, I am always flexible and work with clients to accommodate their needs as best as possible.

questions.question: Do you handle the launch and hosting of the software?
questions.answer: Yes, I can assist with the software launch and advise you on the best hosting options based on the scale and expected traffic of your project.

questions.question: Do you offer performance optimization services?
questions.answer: Yes, performance is a critical factor for any software. I optimize the code and structures to ensure the software is fast and efficient, even under load.
